title: Flamingals Straight Leg Boyfriend Jeans for Women Button Hem Mid Waisted Bootcut Jeans
description: Features: These jeans feature a straight leg design that flatters your silhouette and a mid waist for a comfortable fit. With button, pocket, and zipper details, they add a stylish touch to your outfit. The high stretch fabric ensures ease of movement. Whether it's for off-duty days or any occasion, these jeans are versatile and perfect for showcasing your personal style. Elevate your look and feel confident with these jeans that enhance your appearance and personality.
Material: Made from carefully chosen stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction.

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're running errands, attending a casual get-together, or heading to the office, this piece is the perfect choice. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable.

L:Waist:31-32",Hip:42-43",,Inseam length:32-33".
